collection.title: Bottles for Breastfed Babies
collection.body_html: Make the transition between breast and bottle seamless. This collection is specially curated for breastfed babies, featuring bottles with wide, soft, breast-like teats to encourage a natural latch and reduce the chance of nipple confusion. Perfect for parents who are combination feeding or introducing a bottle for the first time.

products.title: 240ML BPA-Free Anti-Colic Baby Bottle Wide-Neck PP Plastic
products.body_html:
Feeding time should be simple, but it often becomes messy and stressful without the right tools. Spilled milk, bottles that don't seal properly, and nipples that cause colic or gas can quickly frustrate both parent and child. The 240ML Baby Bottle changes that reality by offering a practical, safe, and comfortable feeding solution built to keep babies happy and parents stress-free.

Thoughtfully designed with both function and comfort in mind, the 240ML Baby Bottle provides an easy-to-hold structure, a natural nipple shape, and an anti-colic vent system. Its size is ideal for growing babies, while its lightweight and durable construction makes it just as convenient for home use as for travel. Parents can finally enjoy smoother feeding sessions without worrying about leaks or discomfort.




WHAT MAKES THE 240ML BABY BOTTLE DIFFERENT


✅ ANTI-COLIC TECHNOLOGY – Built with a venting system that prevents air intake, reducing gas and discomfort. Babies experience calmer, happier feeds, and parents enjoy more peaceful nights.

✅ SAFE & DURABLE MATERIAL—The 240ML baby bottle is made with BPA-free, high-quality plastic that resists wear and tear. Parents can trust it to last through daily use while keeping every feed safe.




✅ NATURAL NIPPLE DESIGN – Created to mimic breastfeeding, easing the transition between breast and bottle. This reduces feeding resistance and helps maintain a natural feeding rhythm.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN – The wide-mouth opening makes cleaning and sterilizing quick and thorough. Parents save valuable time while ensuring the 240ML Baby Bottle always remains hygienic.





✅ PERFECT SIZE FOR FEEDING – 240ML The bottle balances capacity and convenience, holding just the right amount for a growing baby. It's compact enough for diaper bags, making feeding on the go stress-free.



SIMPLE TO USE 240ML BABY BOTTLE


1. Fill the 240ML Baby Bottle with milk or formula.

2. Secure the leak-proof lid and nipple.

3. Feed your baby comfortably at home or on the go.

4. Clean with ease and reuse for the next feeding.


Research shows that over 65% of parents face daily feeding challenges like gas, bottle leakage, or nipple rejection. Without the 240ML Baby Bottle, these struggles lead to restless nights, wasted formula, and added frustration during an already busy routine.

Families using the 240ML Baby Bottle report smoother feeding sessions, less fussiness, and more time enjoying their baby instead of troubleshooting feeding issues. With its anti-colic design, natural nipple, and reliable build, this bottle gives parents peace of mind while making every meal a positive experience.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS


Material: BPA-free PP Plastic

Colors: Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green

Package Size: 180 x 110 x 60 mm

Care Instructions: Wash and disinfect before each use; store away from insects and bacteria in a sanitary place.



 

A Nestacular Promise

products.title: Babsy BPA-Free Baby Bottle - Anti-Colic Newborn Feeding Bottle
products.body_html:
Babsy Newborn Baby Bottle – Safe BPA-Free Feeding Solution

  • The Babsy Newborn Baby Bottle is designed to make feeding easier, safer, and more comfortable for infants. Crafted from BPA-free, food-grade materials, this baby bottle ensures every feeding is hygienic and secure.

    Its soft nipple design mimics the natural feel of breastfeeding, providing comfort and helping babies transition smoothly between breast and bottle. With an anti-colic system, the Babsy bottle reduces air intake, preventing gas and discomfort during feeding.

    Lightweight and easy to clean, it's the perfect choice for newborns and infants, giving parents peace of mind and babies a safe, enjoyable feeding experience.

    Key Features:

    • Safe & BPA-Free: Made from food-grade, non-toxic materials.

    • Soft Nipple Design: Mimics breastfeeding for comfort.

    • Anti-Colic System: Prevents gas, spit-up, and fussiness.

    • Lightweight & Durable: Ideal for daily use and travel.

    • Easy to Clean: Simple structure for quick hygiene.

    Give your little one safe and natural feeding with the Babsy Newborn Baby Bottle.

products.title: HeartBabe Silicone Baby Feeding Bottle – Soft, Safe Breast Milk Nursing Bottle for Infants ✅
products.body_html:
Give your baby a natural and safe feeding experience with the HeartBabe Silicone Baby Feeding Bottle. Made from premium food-grade silicone, this bottle is BPA-free, soft, and safe, closely mimicking the natural feel of a mother’s breast for easy latching.

Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit-up, the anti-colic vent system ensures smooth milk flow and a more comfortable feeding experience. The wide-caliber design makes cleaning and filling simple, while the soft, squeezable body allows parents to gently control milk flow. Perfect for newborns and infants, HeartBabe provides a comforting, mother-like feeding solution for growing babies.

 Key Features

  • Soft Silicone Bottle: Gentle, squeezable design for easy feeding.

  • Safe & BPA-Free: Made with food-grade silicone for baby’s health.

  • Natural Breast-Like Nipple: Helps with easy latching and transition.

  • Anti-Colic Vent System: Reduces gas, spit-up, and discomfort.

  • Easy to Clean: Wide-mouth design for quick filling and washing.

products.title: Minimo Silicone Baby Bottle – Breast Milk Imitating Feeder for Infants
products.body_html:
Give your baby a natural feeding experience with the Minimo Silicone Baby Bottle. Designed to imitate the feel of real breast milk, this feeder provides comfort and familiarity for infants during both breastfeeding transitions and daily feeding.

Made from premium, food-grade silicone, the Minimo bottle is soft, safe, and durable, ensuring your baby enjoys a gentle feeding experience. The anti-colic design helps reduce gas and fussiness, while the easy-to-clean structure makes it a favorite for parents.

Perfect for newborns and infants, this feeder promotes a smooth transition between breast and bottle, making feeding time more natural and stress-free.

Key Features:

  • Breast Milk Imitation: Natural feel for smooth transitions.

  • Safe Silicone Material: Food-grade, BPA-free, and durable.

  • Anti-Colic Nipple: Reduces air intake for comfortable feeding.

  • Easy to Clean: Simple, hygienic design for daily use.

  • Infant-Friendly: Perfect for newborns and growing babies.

Make feeding time easier and more natural with the Minimo Silicone Baby Bottle.
